project.Title: pinhead class mod
project.ItemDescription: new class - hellraiser's cenobite -pinhead 1.Description Hello everyone! I made new class mod with Pinhead character from 1987' horror movie - Hellraiser. It is not finished yet but I will improve by receiving feedback. So please send me a lot of impressions. My english is not good. so I did not translate my mod yet. I will fix it soon. 2.Tanks to Korean DarkestDungeon online community - DCinside 다키스트 던전 마이너 갤러리 Character skill sounds - 야호(116.127) Balancing advice - Deme(112.167) Character motion - ㅇㅇ(119.197) and everyone...
